name: eleventy-duo
description: Blog based on Eleventy Duo theme

scripts.build: rm -rf ../_final_site && mkdir -p ../_final_site/blog && cp ../index.html ../_final_site/ && cp -R ../css ../_final_site/ && cp -R ../js ../_final_site/ && cp -R ../images ../_final_site/ && cp ../CNAME ../_final_site/ && npm run build:site && cp -R ./_site/. ../_final_site/blog/
